newsitem.title: JAPAN: Tokyo stocks flat in early morning trade.
newsitem.headline: Tokyo stocks flat in early morning trade.

text.p: Tokyo stocks were flat in the early Wednesday morning session, stalled by a lack of factors to push them in either direction, brokers said. They said there were hopes that institutional investors would continue bargain-hunting from the previous day.
As of 0014 GMT, the Nikkei 225 was 0.10 point down at 20,413.36. Its March futures were up 70 points at 20,480.
"There are no factors or participants to buy aggressively and the lid on the Nikkei average is very heavy at the 20,500 level, discouraging gains," one fund manager said.
